RPS.bot is an intro to opponent modeling through the game Rock Paper Scissors. 

Repeated Rock Paper Scissors, while simple on the surface, "allows the challenge to focus mainly on the tenuous balance between maximizing reward while not being exploitable" (DeepMind, 2023). 

**Get started now** with [Intro to RPS](intro.qmd).
